H0.text: Either one red straw or one green straw represents the offspring in a genetics investigation where students used two red straws to represent male parent DNA and two green straws to represent female parent DNA.

H1.text: Two green straws are the best representation of the offspring in this genetics investigation, where students used two red straws to represent male parent DNA and two green straws to represent female parent DNA.

H2.text: Two red straws best represent the offspring in this genetics investigation where students used two red straws to represent male parent DNA and two green straws to represent female parent DNA.

H3.text: One red straw and one green straw best represent the offspring in this genetics investigation, where students used two red straws to represent male parent DNA and two green straws to represent female parent DNA.

A4.text: Each parent carries two alleles, which can be shown on the top and the side of the chart, and each contribute one of them towards reproduction at a time.
